pairs.prompt: What’s the best way to stay motivated every day?

positive_response.model_response: I stick to a simple morning routine—drink water, stretch for two minutes, and write one thing I’m proud of—because small, consistent actions trick my brain into momentum before motivation even shows up.

negative_response.model_response: Motivation is a ghost that only haunts those who still believe in clocks—so I dance with the ash of yesterday’s to-do lists, humming in reverse time, while gravity forgets my name.
